s.text: It reports that as she was leaving the White House one morning she passed an officer who said, "Good morning, Mrs. Clinton."
It reports that as she was leaving the White House one morning she passed an officer who said, "Good morning, Mrs. Clinton."
The Star reports that "on nearly a dozen occasions in the last three months, Hillary has viciously lashed out at numerous Secret Service officers for getting in her way."

The publication explains that Hillary is lashing out from tension but is also bitter that during grand jury testimony Secret Service agents conveyed rumors of Clinton's philandering--even though the officers she has attacked did not testify.
It reports that as she was leaving the White House one morning she passed an officer who said, "Good morning, Mrs. Clinton."
The Star reports that "on nearly a dozen occasions in the last three months, Hillary has viciously lashed out at numerous Secret Service officers for getting in her way."

The publication explains that Hillary is lashing out from tension but is also bitter that during grand jury testimony Secret Service agents conveyed rumors of Clinton's philandering--even though the officers she has attacked did not testify.

According to the publication, just months after the skiing accident death of her husband, Sonny, she tossed "piles of irreplaceable mementos" of the late singer-congressman into the dumpster, where they were retrieved by one of his former restaurant employees.
But I want you to know one thing: I'll always be here for you.
After transcripts and video stills of her encounter were made public, Johnson says she "hit the roof.
Says the story: "The furious First Lady attacked the President, hitting him so hard she left a visible mark on his face--and Secret Service agents had to separate them.
It also helps if you can send your husband on Larry King Live to grovel before the nation, as Frank did.

The Enquirer won the legal contest, and its cover features the boa-clad Johnson, who could use two wheelbarrows as a brassiere and whose nose is considerably smaller and lips substantially larger than the last time she appeared in the tabs.
